title: Self-Management Support (SMS) Training for Healthcare Professionals: Blended Learning-Based Simulation Training

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical/public health knowledge and basic patient counseling competencies
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service professionals in healthcare, law, and technology focusing on acquiring patient self-management support skills, combining VR simulations and online discussions in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain three or more methods for establishing collaborative partnerships when setting patient goals
Learners can execute patient-tailored action planning processes in SMS simulations with 80% accuracy
Learners can analyze two ethical dilemma cases arising from self-management support in online discussions and propose solutions.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
